definition[0]: the written form of a speech, play, film etc
example[0]: They write all their own scripts.
definition[1]: the set of letters that are used in writing a language
definition[2]: a piece of work that a student writes in an examination
example[3]: a diary entry written in neat black script
definition[4]: a simple program or series of instructions for a computer, or the language that is used to write these
example[4]: A Windows logon script will assign a printer to a computer.
